Web Downloads
Supported Debrid Hosters
Supported Debrid Hosters

There are thousands and TorBox can support almost all of them.

Updated this week
Table of contents

This list will be forever incomplete. Just because it is on this list, does not mean it will work all of the time, and just because it isn't on this list, does not mean it will not work. Basically, any link you have, give it a shot, TorBox will let you know if it supports the link or not. Many other debrid providers split their lists up into file hosters and streaming hosters, so we will do the same.

If you are looking for something specific, do CTRL+F or CMD+F to search for your hoster in this list.

Web Downloads are only available for paid users on TorBox! You can upgrade your plan here.

Unsupported File Hosters

These are file hosters known to be unsupported on TorBox. They can be on this list due to price, reliability, or us simply disliking them. If it is on this list, it is not supported by TorBox. Please do not ask support to add these if it is on this list, it won't happen. Some of these will outright not work, some will use the free plan.

  • Nitroflare - https://nitroflare.com/

  • Keep2Share (K2S) - https://k2s.cc/

  • FileJoker - https://filejoker.net

  • UploadGig - https://uploadgig.com

  • TakeFile - https://takefile.link

  • FilesMonster - https://filesmonster.com

  • Alfafile - https://alfafile.net

Supported File Hosters

  • 1Fichier - https://1fichier.com/

  • RapidGator - https://rapidgator.net/

  • DDownload - https://ddownload.com/

  • Mediafire - https://www.mediafire.com/

  • Mega (Folders supported) - https://mega.io/ (https://mega.nz, https://mega.co.nz)

  • PixelDrain - https://pixeldrain.com/

  • Turbobit - https://turbobit.net/

  • Hitfile - https://hitfile.net/

  • 4Shared - https://www.4s.io/

  • ClicknUpload - https://clicknupload.me/

  • Katfile - https://katfile.org/

  • Yandex Disk - https://disk.yandex.com

  • FileFactory - https://filefactory.com

  • Archive.org - https://archive.org

  • and more.... just give it a shot, it will likely work.

Unsupported Streaming Hosters

These are streaming hosters known not to work on TorBox. They can be on this list due to restrictions or API limitations, as well as TorBox not supporting piracy on our platform.

  • Spotify - https://spotify.com

  • Amazon Music - https://music.amazon.com

  • Amazon Prime Video - https://www.primevideo.com

  • Apple Music - https://music.apple.com

Supported Streaming Hosters

  • YouTube (Playlists supported) - https://www.youtube.com

  • Twitch (VODs and Livestreams) - https://twitch.tv

  • so many... just give it a shot, it will likely work.
